sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The fight for the Ukrainian city of Bakhmut rages on following Russian strikes on residential buildings and Wagner's claims it has taken full control of the region.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen turns the page on a row over electric vehicle batteries with US President Joe Biden.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Israel's Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu is in Italy to discuss gas exports to Europe, a move that could create an LNG terminal in Cyprus.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Fighting in the Ukrainian city of Bakhmut has intensified with another push by Russian forces in the Donetsk region.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Just west of the city, shelling and missile strikes hit Kostyanyivka, injuring civilians and damaging residential buildings.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The infrastructure in Bakhmut is already destroyed, including rail and road bridges.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Some have described this battle, which is Ukraine's longest and bloodiest, as real hell.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: And it doesn't sound like there will be much left after the chief of Russia's Wagner private military company, Yevgeny Kipurbozhin, said he opened recruitment centres in 42 cities of the Russian Federation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: However, he's part of a power struggle with Russia's defence ministry over claims of victory before Moscow's military.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: On Wednesday he declared what he said was full control of the eastern part of Bakhmut.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: It was a warm welcome for the European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen when she met with US President Joe Biden on Friday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The visit was to open negotiations to try and complete a plan on electric vehicle tax credits.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The White House hopes the move will turn the page on a spat between the EU and America.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The deal could boost the use of European minerals critical in the production of EV batteries that are eligible for US tax credits through Biden's clean energy law.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: I think for us it's very important that on this topic we join forces because it is crucial for our future, for fighting climate change and limiting global warming.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: So for us it was and is important that we join forces, that we are complementary, that we boost the respective clean tech industry on both sides.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The new trade deal would mean Europe could eventually wean itself off being reliant on China in the electric vehicle industry. Israel wants to increase its gas exports to Italy and Europe. Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu made the announcement during his visit to Rome on Friday where he met with his counterpart Giorgio Maloney.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: He said the move could also raise the possibility of creating a liquefied natural gas terminal in Cyprus.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Our cooperation in gas, Italy, you said, wants to be a hub for the supply of energy for Europe and for many other things. Well, we think that exactly that and we have gas reserves that we are now exporting and we'd like to expedite more gas exports to Europe through Italy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Netanyahu met with Italy's business minister, Adolfo Urso, before meeting the Italian premier.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Urso says Italy is working hard to become a European gas hub and reduce its dependency on Russian supplies since its full-scale invasion of Ukraine began.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Police in Germany are facing mounting scrutiny after details emerged that authorities had been tipped off

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: about the gunman who went on to kill at least seven people, including an unborn baby, and then himself, in a Jehovah's Witness hall in Hamburg on Thursday, amid fears the death toll will rise again. Germany's Chancellor told reporters of the shock the country is feeling.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: We are speechless in view of this violence. My thoughts are with the victims and their relatives in the difficult times. We are saddened by those who have been torn so brutally apart. In den schweren Stunden bei den Opfern und ihren Angehörigen. Wir trauern um diejenigen, die so brutal aus dem Leben gerissen wurden.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Die Anonymen Personen brachten in dem Schreiben die Auffassung zum Ausdruck, dass der Philipp F. an einer psychischen Erkrankung leiden könnte, ohne, wie die Person schreibt, dass dieses ärztlich diagnostiziert sei.
